text: If you provide us with your social media details, we may retrieve publicly available information about you from social media.

Our Service Providers.
Information we receive from you includes information you share with us, such as when you create an account on one of our websites.

we may pass on the information we have about you to other companies, retailers, financial organisations or other organisations specialising in the prevention of fraud and crime. We are sometimes obligated to disclose the information we have about customers to law enforcement agencies

you may contact us anytime to opt-out of: (i) direct marketing communications; (ii) automated decision-making and/or profiling; (iii) our collection of sensitive personal data; (iv) any new processing of your personal data that we may carry out beyond the original purpose; or (v) the transfer of your personal data outside the eea.

we are not currently processing your personal data for such type of automated decision-making, including profiling, but if we elect to do so in the future we will provide you with notice and choice, in accordance with eu data protection law.
your choice entirely to provide us or not.
At Our Site You can be assured that Your Personally Identifiable Information is secure, consistent with current industry standards.
You can also ask us to share your information in a usable format with another company
We will only transfer your personal data to countries that have been found to provide an adequate level of protection for personal data.

We collect Personal Information from you when you voluntarily provide such information, such as when you contact us with inquiries, subscribe to our or a Privy End Customer’s e-mail newsletter, register for access to the Services or use certain Services.
If you prefer that we not share your personal information with Third Parties, please click here, and follow the instructions provided.

We may also share your Personal Information with our affiliates for purposes consistent with this Policy.
you can submit a data subject access request if you think that you have been legally or significantly affected as a result of automated decision making or profiling by us.

Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential.
